hero.headline: Transform your outdoor space with Wicho Landscaping
hero.subtext: Experts in garden design, green space maintenance, and irrigation systems in Sarasota and surrounding areas.

services.title: Garden Design
services.description: Beautiful custom garden layouts designed to suit your space.

services.title: Mulch Installation
services.description: Protect your soil and improve curb appeal with quality mulch.

services.title: Garden Maintenance
services.description: Keep your garden vibrant and well-trimmed year-round.

services.title: Garden Lighting Design
services.description: Add elegance and security with professional lighting.

services.title: Grass Lining Design
services.description: Installation and design of lawn edging for residential yards — perfect for clearly defining green spaces.

services.title: Grass Cutting & Planning
services.description: Smart mowing and layout strategies for perfect lawns.

services.title: Irrigation System
services.description: Automated watering systems to keep your plants thriving.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.headline: Excellence in Every Yard
whyChooseUs.description: With Wicho Landscaping, a local landscaping company in Sarasota, you're choosing a team dedicated to quality, attention to detail, and personalized service in every project.

features.name: Professional Landscaping
features.description: From design to maintenance, we handle it all with care and expertise.

features.name: Clean & Precise Work
features.description: We leave your yard spotless and your lawn perfectly trimmed.

features.name: Personalized Service
features.description: Direct attention and free estimates tailored to your needs.

steps.title: 1. Request a Free Estimate
steps.description: Tell us about your landscaping needs and we'll give you a no-obligation quote.

steps.title: 2. Schedule Your Service
steps.description: We agree on a convenient time to complete your garden or lawn project.

steps.title: 3. Enjoy a Beautiful Yard
steps.description: We show up on time and deliver high-quality landscaping work — satisfaction guaranteed.

about.title: About Us
about.description3: we bring passion, precision, and professionalism to every outdoor space. With years of experience in garden design, maintenance, and lawn care, we’re committed to helping you create a beautiful, functional, and relaxing environment right outside your door. Whether you need a simple trim or a complete garden makeover, we’re here to deliver results you’ll love. Based in Sarasota, we proudly help families across South Florida transform their landscapes. Contact us today to start your project.

questions.q: What landscaping services do you offer?
questions.a: We provide garden design, mulch installation, garden maintenance, lighting design, grass lining, grass cutting & planning, and irrigation systems.

questions.q: How do I request a free quote?
questions.a: You can request a free quote by filling out our contact form or calling us at (941) 879-4806.
We proudly serve South Florida and nearby areas. Contact us to confirm availability in your location.

secondaryCTA.description: We’ll make your outdoor space look amazing — and you’ll save.

footer.subheading: We transform your garden into a unique and natural space.

checkout.title: Checkout Now
checkout.description: Review your order before completing the payment.

success.title: Payment Successful
